member.name: NMLISTVIEW
member.summary: Contains information about a list-view notification message. This structure is the same as the NM_LISTVIEW structure but has been renamed to fit standard naming conventions.

member.name: NMLISTVIEW.hdr
member.summary: structure that contains information about this notification message.

member.name: NMLISTVIEW.iItem
member.summary: Identifies the list-view item, or -1 if not used.

member.name: NMLISTVIEW.iSubItem
member.summary: Identifies the subitem, or zero if none.

member.name: NMLISTVIEW.uNewState
member.summary: New item state. This member is zero for notification messages that do not use it. For a list of possible values, see List-View Item States.

member.name: NMLISTVIEW.uOldState
member.summary: Old item state. This member is zero for notification messages that do not use it. For a list of possible values, see List-View Item States.

member.name: NMLISTVIEW.uChanged
member.summary: Set of flags that indicate the item attributes that have changed. This member is zero for notifications that do not use it. Otherwise, it can have the same values as themask member of the structure.

member.name: NMLISTVIEW.ptAction
member.summary: structure that indicates the location at which the event occurred. This member is undefined for notification messages that do not use it.

member.name: NMLISTVIEW.lParam
member.summary: Application-defined value of the item. This member is undefined for notification messages that do not use it.
